channel.title: Need help
channel.description:
Hello Friends, My HTC Mobile is not accepting Memory card? What I do now? Is there any problem in Memory card or mobile? Please reply me.
Thanks,

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

[quote=“crazyzoarhaina, post:1, topic:520379”]Hello Friends,
My HTC Mobile is not accepting Memory card? What I do now? Is there any problem in Memory card or mobile?
Please reply me.

Thanks,[/quote]

You’re better off posting this at the HTC support forums.
I don’t walk into a camera shop and ask them for computer tech support. It’s inefficient and a waste of everyone’s time.

Read full topic
